title.rendered: Southern Living Idea House Showcases Eldorado Stone®

content.rendered:
Eldorado Stone®, manufacturer of the world’s most believable architectural stone veneer, is featured in Southern Living’s 2012 Idea House, the renovation of a 19th century cottage-style farmhouse in Senoia, Georgia. The revival project draws inspiration from the historical Southern farmhouses while incorporating a modern aesthetic. The addition of Eldorado Stone® products is the ideal complement to the eco-friendly design of the Southern Living Idea House.

The project features the latest addition to the Eldorado Fireplace Surrounds collection, The Soho Boutique™. The modern, clean lines of the hand-crafted limestone surround brings a unique flare to the space when paired with a traditional wood mantel. The Eldorado Fireplace Surrounds are a fraction of the cost compared to natural limestone surrounds and the installation takes half the time with the company’s proprietary manufacturing and installation processes.

 

Download Press Release
